name: Hoop Hit - BasketBall Shot Hot
description:
Hoop Hit is a unique immersive basketball game that anybody can enjoy! Shoot the hoops, unlock new balls, conquer all game modes，prove you are the next basketball star!

With simple&fast gameplay, Hoop Hit offers endless competitive basketball fun!

Features：
- Easy to play& smart touch controls
- No internet connection needed
- Realistic 3D graphics, crazy fluid animations
- More than 20 new awesome skins to unlock with achievements!
- Challenge & timing game modes
- Fast-paced gameplay

This is a free game for basketball shot.
There are many balls to choose from.
Have fun
